item.title: HUGO and VSCode Dev Container
item.description: HUGO is a particular Content Management System: with HUGO, you can generate a static website in the content editing phase directly on the content creator’s PC. You can publish a website using a simple disk space, without dbms or an application server. I realized this blog using HUGO, for example. The website sources are in a folder (e.g. /home/myname/myblog-src), to compile them I need to run the HUGO client (HUGO). This client generates static files in the public folder (/home/myname/myblog-src/public).
